name: singularuunet
short_description:
singularuunet aims at ease the relationship between singularity agents and humans especially in the field of usenet forums. Considering that the AI has made enormous improvements, it is now difficult to see the differences between humans and agents when they are placed in a context where textual messages are the main discussion medium. This research project contributes to the studies of human behaviours in virtual worlds.

If you want to support the projet, we accept only virtual currencies like ven or bitcoins. You can donate to the bitcoin address 14ToEYCaqkkapn55K3xg6kt57zsWU9STfo (or flexcoin account felszereos)
summary: Using singularity agents to discuss on UUNET forums
